abstract: Labor Dept opens investigation into India-based outsourcing companies Tata Consultancy Services and Infosys; cites possible violation of rules for foreign technology workers at Southern California Edison.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Labor is investigating two India-based firms for possible violations of rules for visas for foreign technology workers under contracts they held with Southern California Edison.

headline.main: Outsourcing Companies Under Scrutiny Over Visas for Technology Workers
headline.print_headline: Outsourcing Companies Under Scrutiny Over Visas for Technology Workers

snippet: The Department of Labor is investigating two India-based firms for possible violations of rules for visas for foreign technology workers under contracts they held with Southern California Edison.
